lines.text: I am Sailor Moon, the champion of justice. In the name of the moon, I will right wrong and triumph over evil... and that means you!
[Holding on for dear life]
Don't drop me!
Hey, have I ever let you down?
You've got to stop reading so many romance novels!
Look who's talking! You think the paperboy likes you just because he rides by your front door every morning!
Give me your password for voice-check.
"I love tuna fish and field mouse pudding."
I am Sailor Moon! I stand for love. And I also stand for justice. And in the name of the Moon, I will punish you!
Mars Fire Ignite!
Serena. Beautiful... but a shopaholic.
You know, Serena, I really think you'd be a great model...
Hmm?
I know this place where they take tons of pictures. You fit in really well there. It's called the zoo!
[About Serena's test score.]
A thirty?
[sarcastically]
Admirable!
No!
Are you stupid or just... incredibly lazy?
Mercury Bubble Blast

[about Rini]
I won't let you take her... do you hear me? Nobody takes her without facing me first... YOU'RE DUSTED BUSTER!
How nice of you to join us, Tuxedo Mask. You can share the same fate they're going to suffer.
You use you power only for evil, Jedite. Big mistake.
Moon Prism Power! ...And make it fast!
Venus lovechain encircle!
That's so sweet I'm getting cavities!
I don't get it. My mother's sure acting strange.
Yeah! What'd she put in her coffee this morning?

[To Sammy]
You're cruisin' for a bruisin'!
Better enjoy that laugh, Beryl. It's the last one you'll ever have.
You've got guts, Jupiter. But it takes more than guts to beat the Negaverse. Give up now, you'll never win.
Very impressive, you didn't land a single punch.
I was just warming up, hotshot.
That's as good an excuse as any. Now it's my turn. You better take some notes, 'cause you're gonna get beaten and beaten badly.
We're doing Snow White, not the Jungle Book!
I've had it with this itchy costume! We were supposed to be dwarves, remember? Not animals! I feel like some little five-year old back in kindergarten!
Bullying little kids, how far you go, pal? Are you just a schoolyard bully?
Find out, cape boy!
[While being chased by a jet]
How will I ever explain to my friends why I have tire tracks down my back?
Give it back! Give it back to Raye right now! You'll pay for your rotten ways!
Don't worry... I won't hurt you if you do what I say...
